Description_en: The formal notice that gives details of a tender, award, contract or other event within a contracting process. This may be a link to a downloadable document, to a web page, or to an official gazette in which the notice is contained.
Information for potential suppliers, describing the goals of the contract (e.g. goods and services to be procured), and the bidding process.
Detailed technical information about goods or services to be provided.
Information about how bids will be evaluated.

Title_en: Replies to issues raised during PreBid Conference

Description_en: Information on bidders or participants, their validation documents and any procedural exemption s for which they qualify
Report on the evaluation of the bids and the application of the evaluation criteria, including the justification fo the award
A report on the status of implementation, usually against key milestones.
Dates and amounts of stage payments made (against total amount) and the source of those payments

Title_en: Assesment of assets and liabilities of governement related to the contract
Provisions for management of risks and liabilities
Financial information including cost overruns, if any
